notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: The data underlying the results presented in the study are available from Tencent real time tracking ( https://news.qq.com/zt2020/page/feiyan.htm#/global.), Ifeng real time tracking ( https://news.ifeng.com/c/specialClient/7tPlDSzDgVk?needpage=1&webkit=1) and data from National Health Commission of the Peopleâ€™s Republic of China ( http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqfkdt/gzbd_index.shtml).
